data.title: Marché du Film - Festival de Cannes
data.text:
BUY, SELL & SCREEN FILMS

Explore the world’s biggest international film market, where you can discover a diverse range of films from around the world and connect with the buyers & sales community.

FIND NEW PROJECTS, TALENTS & PARTNERS

Explore our full lineup of programs and participate in different activities (workshops, pitching sessions, WIP showcases, one-to-one meetings…) according to your interests!

GET A FRESH, NEW TAKE ON THE CINEMA LANDSCAPE

Discover upcoming trends in the film industry through our exclusive panels, keynotes and summits, featuring many of today’s most celebrated speakers and industry leaders.
